title: TESTING PLUG-IN ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT
fullText:
When performing energized fault-finding or testing on electrical equipment that plugs into a socket outlet, an isolating transformer or RCD (safety switch) should be used for protection from electric shock.
Isolating transformers shall comply with the AS/NZS 61558 series.

(a) Type II (30 mA); or
(b) compliant with AS/NZS 61008.1 or AS/NZS 61009.1.
